data.question: What is the chemical formula for the metal-organic framework (MOF) named 1?
What method was used to synthesize the metal-organic framework (MOF) named 1?
What is the primary application of the scintillating lead(II)-based MOF discussed in the paper?
What is the PLQY value of the metal-organic framework (MOF) named 1?
What is the spatial resolution of the Pb-MOF scintillator film for X-ray imaging?
What is the role of the Pb(II) centers in the radioluminescence process mechanism of MOF 1?
data.answer: Pb(II) centers serve as a main X-ray absorption motif and interact with X-ray via photoelectric effect.

data.question: How does the structure of MOF 1 contribute to its X-ray scintillation properties?
data.answer: The robust framework structure and strong C–H⋅⋅⋅π stacking interactions in MOF 1 contribute to its favorable hygroscopic hardness and radiation stability, enhancing its X-ray scintillation properties.

Does MOF 1 exhibit poor hygroscopic stability?
